column1: Joined @AliVelshi on @MSNBC this afternoon to talk about why I’m on #TeamPete! Mayor @PeteButtigieg is the best candidate to bring all walks of life together to have our best chance at winning! https://t.co/w87vl2Vzca

Very excited to announce that I’m  endorsing Mayor @PeteButtigieg to be our next president! He’s best suited to bring the country together has the capability to turn the country around get it back on the right track & provide the hope that we need. https://t.co/OPVAQI3R8l

To the survivors of sexual assault please know that we stand with you and will support you in whatever way needed. The folks of Iowa’s 4th Congressional District deserve a Representative who will put the needs of the people before their hate-filled violent rhetoric. (2/2)

Once again Steve King has opened his mouth and once again he has become an embarrassment to our state. His misogynistic and racist comments do not represent the opinion and values of Iowans. (1/2)  https://t.co/ezzrXQxfrk
Very excited that J.D. has joined the race to defeat Steve King! The people of #IA04 deserve a Representative who will be a voice for all Iowans! -DL https://t.co/3VuAwc7LWv
We've got an important job to do in organizing for the #IAcaucus -- so I'm helping @iowademocrats #BringHomeTheBacon today. Join us!! https://t.co/XsqEijDYec

Had a great time with a bunch of motivated Democrats in Coralville for their July 4th parade. I’m also very proud to support @RitaHartIA! She’ll be a great fit for Iowa and a wonderful representative! #IA02 https://t.co/i0GHrCZ9RE

Very proud to announce that I’ve endorsed Rita Hart to represent Iowa’s Second District. She’ll continue the work we’ve start by giving our vets the support they need expanding broadband & providing more opportunities for vocational and skills training. https://t.co/K11etnWGBO
